title: Dubworth VW Festival 6th-8th May Oulton Park

posts.content:
Rival Bones



Rocking the Dubworth Bierkeller Friday night, Liverpool-based alternative-rock duo Rival Bones!

https://www.facebook.com/rivalbones

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g6CA5uzPrls

Deadline time, if you are planning to enter a Club Stand or enter the your vehicle into the Show and Shine, please have your entry form returned by April 24th. If you still need an entry form, please drop an email to: kate@dubworth.co.uk

Quick rundown of what's on so far (we're still adding more all the time):

Site opens at 3PM Friday 6th May for weekend ticket holders.

Friday evening:
The Nix
Rival bones

Saturday:
Loose Change Buskers for Cancer Research UK throughout the day
The Mighty Aslan (early evening acoustic slot)
Lucy Mae
The Bright Black
Jeramiah Ferrari (headliners, awesome Reggae ska band, have been doing pre-match gigs at the Etihad stadium etc.)

Sunday:
Loose Change Buskers for Cancer Research UK throughout the day

Saturday will consist of the full BRSCC card including Fun Cup, with exhibition vehicles as detailed in here plus others, on the Rally Stage Bob Beales will be performing exhibition laps along with other classic VW/Audi vehicles and clubstands.

Sunday consists of Cycle race/leisure ride on track in the morning, bike show and shine, childrens treasure hunt, Classic Show and Shine, Clubstand and parade lap of all Show and Shine entrants.

The trade village and autojumble will be open all weekend, so far over 20 confirmed traders with more added daily, full list to follow.

On site catering offering a variety of food and drink throughout the site.


If anyone wishes to take part in Show and Shine, Clubstands, Trading or Autojumble(no extra fee, just requires standard ticket), please email info@dubworth.co.uk

Attention acoustic guitarists/musicians! We will be having an acoustic Jam session/open mic (without mic), by our wooded area in the campsite at 5PM on Saturday 7th at Dubworth! Bring the kids. lets all have a sing-a-long!

Preparations are underway at Oulton Park



As the Fun Cup kicked off its season at Brands Hatch, only a few weeks to go until they will be on track at Dubworth

Not long to go until the show now, please get your show and shine forms from info@dubworth.co.uk if you haven't already.

Classes as follows:

-Best in show Aircooled
-Best in show Watercooled
-Best 50's vehicle
-Best 60's vehicle
-Best 70's vehicle
-Best 80's vehicle
-Best 90's vehicle
-Best Bug
-Best Bus
-Best Ghia/Type 3/Type 4/Other VW (or coachbuild)
-Best Buggy/Baja/Kit Car
-Best Rat
-Best Mk1 Watercooled (of any classic VAG group vehicle, Golf, Passat, Polo, Audi 80 etc.)
-Best Mk2 Watercooled (of any classic VAG group vehicle Golf, Passat, Polo, Audi 80 etc.))
-Best Mk3 Watercooled (of any classic VAG group vehicle Golf, Passat, Polo, Audi 80 etc.))
-Best Non-VW (Audi/Porsche/etc)

In association with Auto Finesse and HIC Insurance.
April 24th is the deadline for clubstand forms to be returned...that's this sunday! Please have any forms back to us by then at info@dubworth.co.uk , or if you need a form, get in touch!
Not long to go, and the camp site at Oulton Park is looking good!

Advance tickets are shipping out now, please note the deadline for advance tickets is midday Tuesday 3rd May, after this weekend tickets rise to £40 on the gate, and day tickets rise to £15 on the gate.
Many thanks to all who attended, we had a great turnout and was nice to see everyone enjoying themselves
